name: Seeni Sambol
description: Caramelized onion sambol with Maldive fish
instructions: Add onions and fry until golden
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add chili powder and Maldive fish
cultural_notes: Essential condiment for bread, served at breakfast Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.
description_sinhala: මාලදිවයිනේ මාළු සමග කැරමල් කළ ලූනු සම්බෝලය
description_tamil: மாலத்தீவு மீன்களுடன் கேரமல் செய்யப்பட்ட வெங்காய சாம்போல்
cultural_notes_sinhala: පාන් සඳහා අත්‍යවශ්‍ය කුළුබඩුවක්, උදේ ආහාරය සඳහා සේවය කරයි
cultural_notes_tamil: ரொட்டிக்கு அத்தியாவசியமான காண்டிமென்ட், காலை உணவில் பரிமாறப்படுகிறது
